page.title: 02A typical Claire Duggan day.
page.content: At 8.00 I get up and have my breakfast which is a piece of toast.I leave the house at 8.45 to go to school.School starts at 9.10.We begin the day with mathamatics.Breaktime is from 10.40 to 10.50,then the bell rings for us to come in.We then have our English lesson until lunch time which is 12.10 I go home for lunch and come back at 13.00.I play with my friend Claire until 13.15 when lunch time finishes. Then Mrs. Williams comes in and we have a singing lesson.at 13.45 our teacher Mr. Williams comes back in.We have an Enviromental lesson.At 14.35 we have afternoon break it finishes at 14.45.At about 15.15 we have P.E. we usually play skipping until 15.35.We come in and change,say a prayer and the Elliot Town school day ends at 15.35.At home I play games and watch television. Bedtime is 22.00.
